com.github.nfcforandroid.api.beans

Class NfaRecieveBean<Record extends INfaRecord>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nfcforandroid.api.beans.NfaRecieveBean<Record>
  • Type Parameters:
    Record - the record to write

    public final class NfaRecieveBean<Record extends INfaRecord>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jefBinomed Configuration bean that gives mandatory information about how to read data on a tag :
    • A Activity for the activity that recieve the intent
      A Intent for the information transfer by the system
      A INfaIntentRecieveMessage for the data if it is a message that is expected
      A INfaIntentRecieveRecord for the data if it is a record that is expected
      A INfaParser for the mecanism to parse the datas
      A boolean that indicates if we want to include in the final message the potential AndroidApplicatioNRecord found. The default value is true
    • To create a such instance, you have to use the builder NfaRecieveBean.recieveBeanConfigure().activity(theActivity).intent(theIntent).intentRecieveMessage(callBackMessage).parser(YourParser).build();
